message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer of $120 for this product. We hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $105?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose an offer of $110 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value and benefits of our product, I am willing to accept $108 for it. This is my final offer, as it closely aligns with both our interests.
